oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: One hundred and fifty selected views of Chattanooga, Lookout Mountain, Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park, National Cemetery and Missionary Ridge
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:alternative: Photographs of Lookout Mt., Chickamauga, Missionary Ridge
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hardie Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Viewbook of Chattanooga, Tennessee and surrounding areas published in the 1910s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Chattanooga (Tenn.) -- Description and travel -- Pictorial works; Lookout Mountain (Appalachian Mountains) -- Description and travel -- Pictorial works; Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. and Tenn.) -- Description and travel -- Pictorial works; Missionary Ridge, Battle of, Tenn., 1863
